header.qeveria: Government of the Republic of Kosovo

main.description: Public Administration Reform (PAR) is a platform, on the success and results of which the government is depended for the development and implementation of public policies, and obligations from the European integration process. Public administration reforms create an enabling environment for economic growth and improve services for citizens and business community, while making the public sector more accountable, effective and transparent. In the framework of the Public Administration Reform (RAP), the Government of the Republic of Kosovo is focused on capacity development, rationalization of processes and services that the administration provides to citizens and business community, promoting meritocracy in the recruitment process for civil service, and professionalization of the civil service.

footer.about: The PAR Platform was developed in the framework of the project: 'Support for Implementation and Promotion of the Public Administration Modernization Agenda' of the Department for Public Administration Reform of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, implemented by the Consortium CPM and NOVUS
